extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to KEPServer Version 6.15 or Higher
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the affected software to KEPServer Version 6.15 or higher to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that all control system devices and/or systems are not accessible from the Internet by minimizing network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of Industrial Control Systems (ICS) assets.
